name: overview
data:
[{"id":"2bb7954d-d659-4f08-b8fc-ad2f606bbbc3","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group: Symbol and Semantic Summary Outputs","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"455625f5-b297-4396-a454-f9794f54c243","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group of methods provides "high-level" views of the project's symbols and findings. Rather than focusing on the connections (edges), these methods focus on the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"entities","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (nodes) and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"issues","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" discovered. They allow a user to see a flat inventory of all functions, understand the inheritance structure of the project's classes, and review any diagnostic errors (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"KeyErrors","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") identified by the engine.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"020b4869-ef86-4c87-800f-717bcc5c7560","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"550a2d60-f19b-4a00-baed-43336ef1d965","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f1e0871f-f1d6-4e8d-8ebb-b9ad5fd5faa6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"output_functions()

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Scans the entire ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"DefinitionManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" registry and extracts every namespace that is classified as a function (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"FUN_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). It returns a flat list of strings representing every callable entity discovered in the project.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"84d2f099-43bb-42d6-9f8f-42c4f3e8fc4b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"output_classes()

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Aggregates data from the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ClassManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" into a summary dictionary. For every class, it provides:","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"9470636a-d504-45e8-ab38-6b6df3d2f510","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"mro","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The Method Resolution Order (the inheritance chain).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"78fd9b96-9d88-4ed2-ac36-207eb4435d6c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The file where the class is defined.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0036754f-f33e-41d4-b414-4583d9c5e49f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is the primary source for understanding the object-oriented architecture of the code.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"370025a3-4c97-4dda-b1e6-746b637138c1","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"output_key_errs()

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Retrieves a list of potential ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"KeyError","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" vulnerabilities found during the scan. It extracts this data from the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"key_errs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" collector, providing the specific locations in the source code where dictionary lookups might fail.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2772e79a-d5f7-44da-aeaf-adff080179bd","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"00493f3d-40a6-4170-8057-f6a33e24b67a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d37888c7-557d-4fe5-bd7e-fc9e3f430d93","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"These methods are often used to generate summaries or dashboards of the analysis findings.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"38ed494e-4daf-4a05-bc23-d4aa3cd5456b","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"# 1. Get a simple list of all functions
funcs = cg_gen.output_functions()
print(f"Total functions analyzed: {len(funcs)}")

# 2. Inspect a specific class hierarchy
classes = cg_gen.output_classes()
if "models.User" in classes:
    inheritance = " -> ".join(classes["models.User"]["mro"])
    print(f"User Hierarchy: {inheritance}")

# 3. Check for specific bugs
errors = cg_gen.output_key_errs()
if errors:
    print(f"ALARM: Found {len(errors)} potential KeyErrors!")","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"401f75f9-9a4a-4683-9b13-86cd6e36c322","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f3d6e5bf-7b00-4ac6-9b9d-390a54649630","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Type Filtering","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": These methods demonstrate the benefit of the categorization system in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"machinery.definitions","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" module. Because every entity has a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def_type","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the generator can easily filter thousands of symbols to find just the functions or just the classes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d8e12ac2-a27d-406e-b0bf-a53e3e278034","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"OO Reconstruction","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The output of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"output_classes","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is particularly useful for debugging "missing" methods; by looking at the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"mro","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", a developer can see exactly where Jarvis thinks a method should be inherited from.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6b43ff43-7623-44c1-8be1-f81efc1bd66e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Actionable Diagnostics","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"output_key_errs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" provides the "security findings" of the tool, moving beyond architectural mapping into actual static analysis bug-finding.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"013770c4-c62c-4bf8-aecb-e9f3286071e3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
